auth.resend_code_sent: Verification code has been resent to your email
auth.login_subtitle: Please sign in to your existing account
auth.forgot_password_subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
auth.reset_password_instruction: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
auth.reset_password_info: Make sure to check your spam folder if you don't see the email within a few minutes.
auth.reset_failed: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
auth.signup_success: Your account has been created successfully!
auth.signup_failed: Failed to create your account. Please try again.
auth.error_connection: Unable to connect. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
auth.error_server: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
auth.error_not_verified: Account created but needs verification. Redirecting to verification screen...
auth.error_email_already_exists: An account with this email already exists. Please use a different email or try logging in.
auth.error_invalid_credentials: Invalid email/username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
auth.error_verify_with_email: Account verification required. Please log in with your email address to access verification.
auth.login_required: Please log in to place an order.
auth.verification_subtitle: We have sent a code to your email
auth.verification_failed: Verification failed. Please check your code and try again.

checkbox.agree_terms: I agree to the Terms & Conditions

validation.password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.terms_required: You must agree to the Terms & Conditions to continue

default.address: No. 5, Alley 66, Ngo Dinh Street, Hamlet 7, Village 5, Song Phuong Commune

booking.title: Book Delivery
booking.subtitle: Book your service
booking.product_name_hint: Enter the name of your product
booking.product_info_desc: Please provide the name of the item you wish to ship. This helps us track your package throughout the delivery process.
booking.room_selection_desc: Choose which room you want your package delivered to. Our robots will deliver directly to your selected room.
booking.robot_selection_desc: Choose from the available robots below. Each robot shows battery level, current location, and estimated arrival time.
booking.no_robots_available: No robots available at the moment. Please refresh to check again.
booking.no_robots_description: All robots are currently busy or offline. Please try again later or contact support if this issue persists.
booking.error_loading_robots: Failed to load robots. Please try again.
booking.container_selection_desc: Choose an available container for your product. Each container has a unique QR code for verification during pickup.
booking.no_containers_available: No available containers for this robot. Please select a different robot.
booking.robot_data_not_loaded: Robot data not loaded. Please try again.
booking.cargo_spaces_desc: Your car has 2 identical cargo spaces. Please select which one you want to use.
booking.selecting_location: Select a location on the map
booking.location_description: Tap on the map to select your delivery location or use the button to select your current location.
booking.order_network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
booking.success_message: Your delivery has been booked successfully. You can track your delivery in the Orders section.

empty_state.title: No Orders Yet
empty_state.message: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start by booking your first delivery!

qr_scan.title: Scan QR Code
qr_scan.instruction: Position the QR code within the frame to scan
qr_scan.error: Failed to scan QR code. Please try again.
qr_scan.invalid_code: Invalid QR code. Please check and try again.
qr_scan.permission_denied: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes
qr_scan.camera_error: Camera error occurred. Please try again.

confirm_pickup.title: Confirm Pickup
confirm_pickup.message: Are you sure you want to receive this order?

otp_verification.title: Enter OTP
otp_verification.message: We've sent a verification code to your email
otp_verification.resend_failed: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
otp_verification.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

trip_progress.title: Trip Progress
trip_progress.in_progress: Your robot is on the way!
